name: Squared Deadeye
description:
This is a short demo!

The best way I can describe Squared Deadeye is RDR's Deadeye in a Shooter Platforming.

In this demo, there are 3 levels, 2 of them being normal levels and one of them being a short boss level.

WASD - Move
R - Reload
C - Activate Deadeye
M - Mute Music
N - Mute Sound
